name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thomas McCANDLESS, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J, and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thomas McCANDLESS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2007, the appeal is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael Canick Schwartz, Esq., Philadelphia, for Thomas McCandless.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
933 A.2d 650
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thomas McCANDLESS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 2006.
Decided Oct. 16, 2007.
Michael Canick Schwartz, Esq., Philadelphia, for Thomas McCandless.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J, and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
